name: Not my Nuts
description:
Not my Nuts!

Shoot down evil Squirrels and get back the acorns they stole from you.

This game is created for Weekly Hour Game Jam - Week 9 with Squirrel as a theme. It was fun making a game under an hour, it was extremely challenging. Knowing that your time is limited. I managed to finish the game for an hour and twenty minutes, 8 minutes for the art and the rest is programming and testing. I'm quite disappointed since I didn't made it in time. My computer freezes once in a while and runs very slowly as the anti virus runs a full scan in background. Though, I'm still really proud that I made a game in a short period of time.

Game created with Game Maker Studio
Sounds created with bfxr.net

Controls
  • W - Move Up
  • A - Move Left
  • S - Move Down
  • D - Move Right
  • Mouse - Aim
  • Left Mouse Button - Shoot
  • Esc - Restart
